name: Lost Kid 2D
description:
The Lost Kid tells the story of a young boy who lost his console on a strange river, and in any way he would let it sink so he went after it, after sinking to the bottom he finds out he has the capacity to change the reality around him and with that get the console and go back home.

Be that kid and have fun :D

WASD - To move around

SPACEBAR - To use your imagination (watch for the cooldown)
